descr.zh: 一套框架，多种平台，通吃移动与桌面

descr.en: A unified system that combines theory, resources, and tools for crafting digital experiences.
descr.zh: 集理论、资源与数字体验制作工具一体的统一系统

descr.en: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

descr.en: A bundler for javascript and friends.

descr.zh: 运用ES2017异步函数的懂你nodejs中间件

descr.en: The company driving the container movement and the only container platform provider to address every application across the hybrid cloud.
